page.title: 14MY NEIGHBOURHOOD.
page.content: {OXBRIDGE}in some parts it is untidy and in some other parts it is very tidy. {GRANGEFIELD }consists of council and private houses and it is fairly tidy. {FAIRFIELD }has no council houses but does have large old houses and modern houses. It is a very tidy area with a few amenities e.g. phones, playgroups, schools, shops, street lights, playing fields and play areas etc. Fairfield is, I think, the most tidy and well kept area in Stockton. It also has an old railway which was disused a few years ago but has now been turned into a cycle track. The roads in one part of Fairfield are Almond Gr., Autumn Gr., Witton Rd., Orchard Rd., The chase, Blackthorn Gr., Birbrise Rd., and Lime Gr. This area used to be a large orchard hence the names. {Jason Carr (15)
